- Edgeley Park (Stockport, England) closed in 2012 with 10,900.
- Firhill (Glasgow, Scotland) closed in 2012 with 10,887.

Comparing all these, the national stadium's capacity of 53,000 is higher than any other listed. So it was indeed the largest among the closed rugby union stadiums mentioned here.
